content: With the Laurel Buds equipped, using the Gourd will moderately increase the damage reduction for a short duration of time. This duration is rather short, but it can be the difference between life and death in a pinch or one of the tougher boss fights in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Laurel_Buds.md', within the main section titled 'Laurel Buds'.
The content is as follows:
With the Laurel Buds equipped, using the Gourd will moderately increase the damage reduction for a short duration of time. This duration is rather short, but it can be the difference between life and death in a pinch or one of the tougher boss fights in the game.
